recipes.label: Arrival at the library
recipes.startdescription: I cross the threshold and enter. No turning back now.
recipes.description: Walk until the third door on the left, past the statues, down a staircase, follow the signs. You're not entirely sure how, but you've finally arrived at the lobby.

recipes.label: Walking, walking
recipes.startdescription: Maybe I can find someone who can help me?
recipes.description: Behold! A libarian appears on front of me. He introduces himself as "Kevin". What a peculiar name.

recipes.label: Talk to Kevin
recipes.startdescription: Maybe he can give me some directions?
recipes.description: "Uh, I just started here. I found this pamphlet in my desk, maybe it can help you?"

recipes.label: I need a place to study what I've found.
recipes.startdescription: This place looks like a cozy place, if I clean it up slightly.
recipes.description: I've made a desk and a chair out of some books.

recipes.label: Read the pamphlet
recipes.startdescription: The pamphlet contains an useful map on its flipside. Though, The Library continues beyond the edges of the paper. Hopefully it can guide me to the next step.

recipes.label: Ask Kevin to light the candle
recipes.description: Luckily Kevin is a smoker, so he lights the candle with his lighter

recipes.label: Following the directions to the Center Hall
Following the directions to the Center Hall
recipes.startdescription: Walking through narrow corridors and curving paths.

recipes.label: Ask Kevin to hold the candle
recipes.startdescription: "Uh, sure, I can hold the candle for you"
